title: Amazon Linux 2 2017.12 - ALAS2-2019-1316: important priority package update for java-11-amazon-corretto
description:
Package updates are available for Amazon Linux 2 that fix the following vulnerabilities:
CVE-2019-2999:
	No description is available for this CVE.
99999: 
CVE-2019-2999 OpenJDK: Insufficient filtering of HTML event attributes in Javadoc (Javadoc, 8226765)

CVE-2019-2992:
	No description is available for this CVE.
99999:

CVE-2019-2989:
	No description is available for this CVE.
99999:

	No description is available for this CVE.
